title: Misunchi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Italian, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: A small vegetarian and vegan restaurant/delicatessen situated close to Milano Bovisa Politecnico railway station and to Politecnico University. The daily lunch offers a great variety of vegan dishes, a couple of vegetarian choices and vegan desserts and cakes. Mostly organic and made-in-house, including focaccia and seitan, the specialty. Also is a shop where you can buy organic products. Seating for around 20. Peaceful and cheerful atmosphere with friendly owners.
